title: Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman giving birth

preview.html: And if he knew some of the wrongdoers, then the meaning indicates that he will witness the birth of words about it, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is about to give birth, then she will be very sad. This is an indication that she has gone through many difficult things in this world. The period of her life, and God knows best. An unmarried woman who sees in a dream that she is preparing to give birth. It indicates her engagement equipment if she has not been engaged before. She will live happily, God willing. It also shows that an unmarried woman who sees in a dream giving birth naturally was very afraid. It expresses her stress and tension during this time for something important that is passing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she will give birth by caesarean section soon. Explaining that she is going through a difficult time in her life, but she will get rid of it permanently, God willing. And the unengaged dreamer who sees that she is preparing to give birth In a dream. This is a reference to some people who say bad things about her in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about carrying twins for a married woman who is not pregnant. Interpretation of witnessing childbirth in a dream for a married woman. It indicates that the married woman who sees it in a dream was difficult for her to give birth in the dream. Here is a sign that she is serious about having children again this time. If a woman gets married, her husband travels to a far away place and sees childbirth in a dream. Here the bad things that she goes through in her loneliness during this time appear. Seeing natural childbirth in a dream is for a married woman who wants to have children. Again. Indicating that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. The possibility of giving birth in a dream for a married woman who is going through some worries during this period. A sign that she will get rid of all the problems in which she lives and the fears that exist in her life. And a married woman dreams that she is trying to give birth alone at home. This is an indication of the happiness that she will experience, God willing. The interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a divorced woman explains that a divorced woman who sees that she is giving birth by caesarean section in a dream and is happy. It indicates that she will marry a stranger in her life, but she will be happy with him, God willing. Divorced women try to give birth naturally in The dream. An indication that she is trying to find a living and work to occupy her during this period, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman sees her husband in a dream, she will give birth easily in the dream. This is an indication that she will return to her husband again, and live with him happily, God willing. The divorced woman who was looking for a doctor in a dream to give birth was sad. Here it indicates some of the problems that this divorced woman faces at this time. Read also: Interpretation of a single woman’s dream that she is pregnant. Interpretation of childbirth in a dream for a man and its meaning. The dreamer saw in a dream that he found a woman about to give birth and was helping her. It indicates the good that this dreamer will do in his life. If the dreamer sees his wife giving birth in a dream and her birth was very difficult. This is an indication that this dreamer has problems with his wife, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. And seeing that the dreamer was searching in the dream for a doctor

title: Interpretation of a dream about cooking green beans

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cooking green beans in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cooking green beans in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about cooking beans in a dream Cooking beans can lead to goodness and success, God willing. Seeing a married man cooking peas can mean good luck, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees herself cooking peas, This may indicate success, and God knows all that is unseen. Interpretation of a dream about cooked beans in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about cooked beans in a dream can express praiseworthy things, God willing. But if the dreamer sees cooked beans, it may indicate happy news, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees beans Cooked, this may indicate happiness, and God knows the unseen. Buying cooked beans can also indicate goodness and nutrition, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans with eggs in a dream. Eating cooked beans indicates goodness and happiness, God willing. When the dreamer sees eating beans in a dream This may be evidence of good news, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married man sees himself eating cooked beans and they taste good, this may indicate goodness and care, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As he can express the money and good things he obtains, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying beans in... Dream Interpretation of a dream about buying beans in a dream could be a reference to a new job and livelihood, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if the dreamer sees himself buying beans from a large market, this may lead to exhaustion and unhappiness in earning money and living, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see a married man buying beans, this may indicate To satisfy desires, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. When you see a single girl buying beans, it may be marriage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about dry beans in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about dry beans in a dream could be evidence of money, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself eating dry beans without soaking them in water, this may lead to To earn money after hard work, and God knows the unseen. Seeing soaking dry beans can also represent healing the causes of anxiety, and God is supreme and all-knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating beans in a dream. Sprouted beans can be a reference to visiting the saints, and God knows best. The unseen, as it may express a visit to God’s righteous parents, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees beans growing in the summer in a dream, this may be evidence of fatigue, and God knows best. While seeing beans growing in the winter portends goodness, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing green beans in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing Green beans in a dream can be a sign of getting rid of worries, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees green beans, it can lead to the satisfaction of desires, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a married woman sees green beans in a dream, this can be evidence that she is getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. If she sees a girl

title: Interpretation of a brother marrying his sister in a dream: I saw that I married my sister in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a man marrying his sister in a dream is considered incest, as is a man marrying his mother, aunt, or uncle to an unmarried girl, a married woman, or a pregnant woman, and I dreamed that I was getting married. Brother of Ibn Sirin, seeing a wedding in general is a warning and a warning to the dreamer that his period is approaching and his death is approaching, God forbid, if the man sees himself as a groom and on the wedding day, especially if it is the woman. married to. In a dream, he does not know her. In the event that a man knows the woman he is marrying in the sense that she is a friend of his, a relative, a relative, or a distant one, then the interpretation of the vision is organized according to the name, biography, and degree of beauty of this woman, which means that if she is beautiful, then her life is good and she has a beautiful name, so this vision portends With wealth and happiness and vice versa. Seeing a man marrying a woman with a disreputable reputation in his dream indicates that this man is committing forbidden things and committing sins and abominations such as adultery, abuse, theft, and the like. Sins and major sins. A man’s marriage to a woman he does not know, but she knows him, means that her family will benefit from that man. As for seeing the same man (brother) marrying his sister in a dream, this symbolizes or portends the existence of major problems and differences between them, and these problems and differences may actually exist. Or they may happen in the past. The near future is due to something, and this problem and disagreements may lead to the severing of the relationship between them. A son’s marriage to his mother in a dream warns the dreamer that he is a false and unjust son of his mother, and he must reconsider himself well in this matter and correct it quickly. A dream about a sister marrying her brother - YouTube

Or it may happen in the near future because of something, and this problem and differences may lead to severing the relationship between them. The son’s marriage to his mother in a dream warns the dreamer that he is a false and unjust son of his mother, and he must reconsider himself well in this matter and correct it quickly. title: Interpretation of a gerbil in a dream, a gerbil and a mouse in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of mice and gerbils for a single, married, pregnant girl. Whether the mouse was killed. It attacked me. The little one chased me. The mouse that enters the house. Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of gerbils in a dream. Seeing gerbils indicates bad women, as problems and misfortunes occur because of them. The gerbil symbolizes a sad woman, and the gerbil can be a male with the same specifications. If the dreamer sees a gerbil in a dream, This indicates that the dreamer is a person who is outside the path of truth, inclined to immorality and exceeds the limits of the law. Seeing a gerbil may mean that the dreamer will marry a woman, but that will cause him great harm in his life. Anyone who sees a small gerbil symbolizes a bad woman that the owner may marry. The dream and stays with him for the rest of his life. Interpretation of the dream of the jerboa by Ibn Sirin. He is one of the converts and he is a false ally. Interpretation of the dream of the jerboa of Nabulsi: In the dream, a man swears a liar, so whoever asks him fights a man, and in the dream he is a digger or a digger. Interpretation of the jerboa in a dream for a man. Seeing many springs indicates abundance of sustenance and more. From profits from God's giftsA fortuneteller who dreams that a gerbil is playing in the house interprets the dream with kindness and a lot of food, because gerbils and mice usually wander and roam not in an empty place, but in a place where there is good food. , drinking...)On the contrary, whoever thinks that a gerbil is leaving the house, this means little sustenance and a waste of money. Whoever sees that a gerbil is playing in a dream, this means that the dreamer is going through a good year in which he does not suffer from hunger or thirst, Because the gerbil does not play until it is usually satisfied with food. If the dreamer sees that he has caught a gerbil, this means that he will get a woman in his life. A gerbil whose tail has been cut off is interpreted as a woman of bad birth and lineage. A gerbil with a cut off tail may indicate that the dreamer will marry or propose to a girl, but He will only receive harm from them. Whoever sees a little gerbil in his dream will be tormented by an evil woman in their lives. He who saw that the gerbil died in his hands interprets this as the emergence of a big problem for the fortuneteller in his real life. Interpretation of a gerbil in a dream for a woman. Whoever sees a gerbil in a dream, it means that there is an evil friend who wishes For you, the dream is a warning that there is interest from close friends around you and that you should not approach people until you confirm their intentions. Whoever sees a gerbil playing in his room and manipulating things, this interprets that the dreamer has a thief entering her house and he is close to her, perhaps relatives, friends, or acquaintances. It is He saw a group of springs in his house, then this dream is not good, and this is explained by the presence of a warning against a woman entering her house. Interpretation of a mouse entering the house in a dream: Anyone who sees springs entering his house and leaving it interprets this as the presence of thieves entering his house and stealing a lot of property and perhaps even money. As for Whoever sees a gerbil playing in his house, his share and money will increase. The gerbil leaving the house indicates a lack of livelihood and earnings. Interpretation of killing a gerbil in a dream. Whoever kills a gerbil in his dream, this indicates that the dreamer will acquire in his real life a woman with undesirable characteristics.

As for Whoever sees a gerbil playing in his house, his share and money will increase. The gerbil leaving the house indicates a lack of livelihood and earnings. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood drawn in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream is that they see seeing blood in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. Many people are afraid of doing blood tests and seeing injections, especially people who are not accustomed to that and who do not work in the medical field and are far from it, so seeing blood and gore in a dream is frightening for them. It is disturbing and they are very interested in knowing its interpretation, so in this article today we will learn about the dream interpretation of seeing bloodshed in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation.Interpretation of the dream of seeing blood drawn in a dreamIf the dreamer sees in a dream that he is bleeding, this is an indication of the material benefit that he gets Someone from him. If you see in a dream that they were drawing bad blood, this is a promising sign that the fears will stop and relief will appear. Seeing the major’s blood being drawn is an undesirable symbol, it indicates his money that he gets from a non-halal source. When the dreamer dreams that Blood does not come out of his body after drawing it, this indicates the stability of the dreamer’s health condition. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he cannot get blood out of his body, this indicates his freedom from harm at the hands of someone in reality. When you dream that blood comes out of the dreamer’s hand instead From his nose, this indicates that the dreamer is forced to do something in reality. Interpretation of a dream of seeing blood drawn in a dream for a man. The meaning of receiving blood from an unmarried man in a dream indicates his marriage to the girl he wants in reality. Seeing blood drawn in a dream for a man symbolizes stability The dreamer’s life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood drawn in a dream for a single woman. As for the meaning of seeing blood drawn in a dream, it indicates that she is in good health in reality. The previous vision is praiseworthy if the blood is clear and red. If spoiled blood is drawn in a dream, this indicates the end of problems and the appearance of weakness. In front of the dreamer. If blood does not come out of the hand when it is drawn in a dream, this indicates the presence of someone seeking to harm the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood bleeding from a hand in a dream for a married woman. In general, seeing blood drawn in a dream means recovery from illness if the dreamer is sick The vision also reflects the stability of her health on earth. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is drawing blood for analysis, this indicates the instability of her married life in reality. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood drawn in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the meaning of seeing blood drawn in a dream for a pregnant woman, this indicates that The dreamer is in good health. If you draw spoiled blood in a dream, the dream indicates freedom from problems and troubles. Interpretation of a dream about seeing blood bleeding from a finger in a dream. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the finger of his right hand is bleeding, then this is a good dream, because it indicates achieving excellence in Work and earn a lot of money. As for the dream of bleeding from the finger of the left hand, it is a sign of the dreamer’s poor health. The previous vision also shows that the dreamer has been harmed by someone close to him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing blood in a dream: If the dreamer sees blood coming from his nose in a dream, then this It indicates that he obtained money illegally. When the dreamer dreams of blood coming out of...

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about locusts

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about grasshoppers. The meaning of the appearance of locusts in a dream varies for the dreamer according to many things mentioned in the vision. In general, interpreters believe that flying locusts are a sign of the army, and it has been stated in some interpretations that they are also a sign of goodness and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about locusts by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about locusts? Confirms Interpretation of a dream about locusts in a dream: some important things that must be understood well so that the dream can be interpreted in a clear way, away from any error, because there is a difference of opinion among interpretation scholars regarding this dream. Ibn Shaheen expects that if locusts are found in a person’s dream and cooked, then the interpretation will be Happier than living, because it heralds a lot of money. This dream may indicate that someone is speaking ill of the dreamer, and the person may fall into an unpleasant relationship immediately after this dream, such as a great calamity that requires patience and prayer. If the locusts have spread in the land to a large extent It can be confirmed that there are harmful people who know injustice and spread it in the land and change people’s conditions for the worse. Therefore, it can be said that killing locusts in some interpretations is a good thing for visions, as in reality it is overcoming a cunning and hidden enemy who possesses a lot of power, which makes him a person. Malicious. If you encounter locusts in your dream and they run towards you and want to bite you, then you should fear God in most of your actions and repent to Him for the evil that you carry in your heart, and this is if you know that you disobeyed. To God while you are violating His commandments. Interpretation of a dream about locusts by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the appearance of locusts in a dream indicates the entry of soldiers into the land in which they appeared, and chaos may spread in the place and conditions may become unpleasant. As for the abundance of locusts, their rapid spread, and their attempt to devour crops and vegetables, This is not good news, but it reflects many sad situations and sins committed by man on earth. This dream may have the meaning of severe punishment and torture that God imposed on some people because it was mentioned in the Holy Qur’an that it is a means of torture and destruction. If the dreamer sees many of them and does not harm people Or harms someone, this may be a sign of increased agriculture, goodness and blessings in the dreamer, and these beautiful expectations are available without any harm occurring. The dream. Ibn Sirin predicts that this topic may indicate collecting a lot of money, especially if the dreamer finds locusts inside a closed or controlled container, so he says that the person will obtain a lot of money and keep it. It can be said that locusts in the dream could be a sign On the entry of happiness into the dreamer’s life and changing any fatigue or difficult situation he is going through, whether in terms of health or material, and God knows best. Therefore, it can be emphasized that the diversity of signs that the locusts appear in the dream and that they do not have a specific interpretation of good or bad, but on the contrary, there is scope There is a wide range of interpretations in this dream. The Dream Interpretation section on the Egyptian website from Google contains many interpretations and questions from fans that you can view. title: Interpretation of eating grape leaves in a dream: seeing grape leaves in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of grape leaves for an unmarried girl and for a pregnant woman: If she picks and buys stuffed grape leaves. Whoever dreams of eating grape leaves, this is evidence of an improvement in her health if she is suffering from an illness, or that her health is good and will not harm her. Eating grapes also indicates the abundance of goodness and abundance of sustenance. Eating grape leaves in a dream also indicates relief from anxiety. For a married woman: Do not worry when you see grape leaves in your dream, this is good. It shows that you are very smart and quick to face any obstacles or problems that you will face in the future or in the coming days. Just watch out for some small obstacles. And solve pending problems in an intelligent way. If you are newly married, seeing grape leaves indicates an imminent pregnancy. If you have children, remember the dream well. If the grape leaves are fresh, this indicates goodness and good health for your children. If the leaves are dry and not fresh, this indicates the exact opposite. For a woman eating grape leaves: This dream foretells death due to illness if you are sick or healthy. Grapes in your dream are success and prestigious positions. Picking Grape leaves If you see yourself picking grape leaves, this indicates that there are many activities in your life that you need to complete as quickly as possible before they multiply. Eating grapes: Eating grapes in a dream indicates kindness, wisdom, and sobriety. As for seeing them stuffed or cooked, it symbolizes the coming of ease and joy. Whoever dreams of grape leaves, it is a sign of goodness and blessing, and that the dreamer is wise enough to act consciously in the face of a difficult situation that may pass and is able to facilitate matters and business. If you see in a dream that grape leaves are cooked or stuffed , this indicates the good that you and your family will receive and that you will earn more for a living and that household problems will disappear and you will be able to solve them all. . If you see in a dream that grape leaves still maintain their green color, this is a sign of abundant material gains, no matter how many difficulties you encounter on your way. Grape leaves in a dream indicate children. If she is married and does not have children, then seeing grape leaves in Her dream means that she will become pregnant and give birth. A divorced woman dreams that she is eating grape leaves - YouTube. Interpretation of a vision of stuffed meat - YouTube

title: Interpretation of jinn in a dream and seeing jinn in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a genie in the dream of an unmarried girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man, whether he turns into a genie or a genie, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq. Al-Nabulsi and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic: The jinn in a dream is a great indication that the person feels jealous or possessed by the jinn or is bewitched, that is, the person tries to harm the basic actions and uses the jinn to harm the dreamer, and in a different interpretation, seeing the jinn in a dream. It refers to the psychological exhaustion in which the viewer lives, who does and imagines absurd things, for example, that he is possessed by the jinn, which means that the subconscious mind responds to those thoughts that will enter him and ultimately lead him to a dream of the jinn and prepare. To see a jinn in a dream and talk to him. What do you think of the dream interpretation of seeing a jinn in a dream? Interpretation of a jinn in a dream, as seeing jeans in our dreams is one of the visions that does not bode well at all, which indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to many difficult problems in the next stage, and the dreamer must To be careful about visions and know details. , in order to get the correct interpretation of each vision. Seeing jeans in dreams and dreams indicates a demonic spirit trying to influence and control the human body. What some call a nightmare or jathom, and it comes due to weak spells and fortifications. Seeing jinn in general in a dream and dreams has many connotations and meanings that Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned in his interpretation books. Their appearance in the life of the dreamer, which may cause him harm and loss in real life, which we will discuss in this article, God willing. Interpretation of jinn or jinn in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned that seeing jinn in a dream and dreams in general and in any form can indicate some deceivers. And scammers in waking life, or he is an enemy and adversary. As for the details of the cases, Imam Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, mentioned many cases of seeing the jinn who sees in his dream that he has become in the form of the jinn in the dream. His vision shows the power of his divination in reality. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is teaching the jinn some knowledge or that he is reading to them The Holy Qur’an in a dream, and he saw in the dream that the jinn listens to the monarch and listens to him. Then the vision shows the high position and reputation that the dreamer achieves in wakefulness, whether this height is represented in rule or in a position he attains, or he finds respect and status from men in reality. As for someone who sees in his dream that a genie is standing in front of his house and house, then this situation indicates the harm that befalls the dreamer in reality, whether it represents a loss that befalls the dreamer in wakefulness, or it is. It is a situation in which he loses and suffers humiliation, contempt, and closeness.. Or this vision is an indication of the dreamer’s failure to fulfill the vow he made to himself. Whoever sees in his dream that the jinn entered his or her house in the dream, this vision indicates that some thieves will enter the dreamer’s house while awake. They cause him harm and evil, and therefore the dreamer must take what is necessary. Measures to prevent this from happening

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream or dream via the website Roy2a.com Surat Al-Waqi’ah is a Meccan surah of 96 verses found in Part 27 and classified in the Qur’an No. 56. It was revealed after Surat Taha and the word “Allah” was not mentioned in it. The incident is one of the names of the Day of Resurrection. The talk of the surah revolves around the occurrence of the afterlife, which is denied by non-Muslims. Seeing Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dreamWhether it is recited, written, or otherwise, we will present to you the most important interpretations given by major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and Ibn Shaheen, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream. Vision Surah Al-Waqi'ah in a dream indicates many good and upcoming benefits for the fortuneteller. Seeing and hearing Surah Al-Waqi'ah in a dream indicates that removing problems and obstacles and changing circumstances for the better. If you see Surah Al-Waqi'ah in a dream, it indicates that the conspirators will respond with victory over the enemies. Reading Surat Al-Waqi'ah is an indication of the world's richness in its needs. It is guidance in this world and the hereafter. Reading Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream indicates safety from fear, enjoying the food of this world, and entering Paradise, God willing. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Luqman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that he saw Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream, which is one of Praiseworthy visions that herald the closeness of the dreamer to his Lord and his wealth in this world and the hereafter by doing good deeds. Seeing Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s uniqueness in obeying and worshiping God, and the right to worship and closeness to the Almighty Lord. Reading Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has good qualities and a sound heart. He loves God. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Hijr in a dream Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream for a single womanReading Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream for unmarried women is an indication of the approaching date of her wedding. If you see Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream, it indicates the presence of a girl for the sake of kindness, sustenance, and good tidings that will come into her life. Seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a girl’s dream indicates her virtue, morals, humility, and compliance with God’s commandments and prohibitions. Seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah indicates that the girl will lose worry and sadness and her circumstances will change for the better in the coming period. The verse and good recitation of Surat Al-Waqi’ah in the girl’s dream is an indication of her academic excellence. See other interpretations: Interpretation Seeing Surat Al-Shams in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a married woman’s dream is an example of her stable and happy life at home and with her family. Seeing Surat Al-Waqi’ah indicates a woman seeing her good qualities and virtuous morals. If a married woman sees Surat Al-Waqi’ah in a dream, and she is waiting The news of her pregnancy, so the vision is good news for her regarding the upcoming pregnancy. Seeing Surat Al-Waqi’a recited in a new Qur’an is an indication of good deeds and goodness. Seeing Surat Al-Waqi’a indicates to a married woman, abundant food will come to him from where he did not expect it, it may be an inheritance. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Waqi’a in a dream for a pregnant woman: seeing Surat Al-Waqi’a The incident in

title: Interpretation of seeing Santa Claus in a dream

preview.html: Meaning of Santa Claus in a dream Dreamed of Santa Claus clothesIt shows that you need to give, accept and forgive and that you need to acknowledge and care about some aspects of yourself. On the other hand, a dream may mean that you are thinking about the good and bad things that you have doneIf you dream that you or someone else is wearing Santa Claus clothes, it means that you should treat others as you would like to be treated and put yourself in the other person's place to know his feelings. If you dream that you or someone is taking a photo with Santa Claus, the dream refers to your personal memories of the Christmas holiday To dream that Santa is attending your wedding highlights this happy occasion
